UI UX improvements and performance update. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly
Resolved the Evernote sync issue. Performance upgrades and other stability improvements. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly

The undo and redo gestures have been changed to avoid unintended activation. The gesture of Undo is now a double tap with 2 fingers while the gesture for Redo is a single tap with 3 fingers. Performance upgrades and other stability improvements. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly

You can now draw curves! The Landscape Planner now comes with a Today button. Tap on it from anywhere inside the planner to go to the current day s page easily. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly
Minor bug fixes and performance updates. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly

Minor bug fixes and performance improvements. Noteshelf Digital Note Taking Simplified!

Plan for the upcoming year with our new 2 page spread planner now available in the Templates Section. Add some holiday cheer to your notes with a special Christmas themed sticker pack available to download within the app from the Templates section. Minor bug fixes and improvements. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly
Resolved the Evernote sync issue. Made minor bug fixes and performance updates. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly
Minor bug fixes and performance updates. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly
Fixed a crash related to text boxes with hyperlinks Made minor bug fixes and improved performance Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly

Bring all your notebooks favorite pens and text styles and custom templates from Noteshelf 2. To enable the migration please ensure that your Noteshelf 2 app is updated to the latest version. Noteshelf 3 is now available on the Apple Watch! Take audio notes on the go and access them from all your iCloud synced devices. You can now tap on a notebook s title to rename it Page numbers will now be displayed on scrolling Minor bug fixes and improvements Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly
Minor bug fixes. Noteshelf Digital Note Taking Simplified!

Notes generated by Noteshelf AI are now even more beautiful! Please go check it out. You can now dock the mini toolbar horizontally at the top. Global search has been improved. Made minor UI improvements in the cover picker. Other minor bug fixes and UX improvements. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly

Resolved the issue of notebooks not opening for some users. Fixed crashes that occurred when tapping on custom templates. Made minor bug fixes and UX enhancements. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly

Creating notebook groups and subgroups has become easier than ever! Now you can create a group directly from the Add menu on the shelf. We have also resolved the issue of increased disk space usage for notebooks. Enjoy improved speed when opening and navigating through your notebooks. The notebook name and page number are now displayed every time you open a notebook. Bug fix: We have resolved an issue where the undo gesture was accidentally triggered. Bug fix: We have addressed difficulties in page navigation during horizontal scrolling. Various minor bug fixes and UX improvements have been implemented throughout the app. Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly

You can now back up all of your notebooks as PDFs! You have the option to back up your notes in both the PDF format and the native file format. We ve added a shortcut to delete a page in the toolbar customization menu. Add this to your toolbar to delete a page with a single tap. You can now set a default font for your notebooks. Find the option in the text style menu. UX improvements and bug fixes Noteshelf Take beautiful notes effortlessly
